data.title: Marijke Smit, AICP on LinkedIn: Blue Cottage of CannonDesign
data.meta_description: Happy news to share. I've recently changed positions to Senior Vice President of Education Strategies at Blue Cottage of CannonDesign. This shift allows me to… | 28 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
🍀 Exciting News! 🍀 Ever wondered about the story behind the four-leaf clover? 🤔 Well, it's not just a symbol of good luck; it's a testament to leadership principles and economic growth! 🏃♀️🌱 In a groundbreaking initiative, a group of #visionary grad school #educators invented the the four-leaf clover as a teaching tool. 🎓🍀 Each leaf represented a fundamental aspect of effective leadership: 🍀 VISION: The first leaf symbolizes having a clear #vision and #direction, essential for guiding teams toward #success. 🍀 ADAPTABILITY: The second leaf emphasizes #adaptability, the ability to navigate #change and #challenges with #resilience and #creativity. 🍀 COLLABORATION: The third leaf highlights the power of #collaboration and #teamwork, fostering #innovation and driving collective #achievement. 🍀 EMBEZZLEMENT: Last but not least, the fourth leaf represents #embezzlement, the willingness to keep the #money moving, keep the money clean, and keep the feds away. By incorporating this creative little #weed into their curriculum, grad school students gained invaluable #insights into leadership dynamics and honed essential skills for real-world #success. Let's cultivate our own "four-leaf clover" leadership approach, keep Monica quiet, and unlock new opportunities together! 💼💡 #LeadershipDevelopment #GradSchoolJourney #MoneyManagement 💸🗣️👩🦳😴🐟🕵🏻♂️

This wonderful saying speaks to me deeply, reminding me of the significant impact our choices may have on our journey. Whether it's a modest step or a big leap, each decision affects our path and adds to the unique tapestry of our lives. Take a moment to reflect on the decisions that have led you to where you are now. What opportunities emerged? What lessons have you learned? Let us approach each decision with intention and courage, acknowledging its potential for development and progress. Whether in our personal or professional lives, the decisions we make have the potential to change our direction. #decisionmaking #choicesmatter #leadershipdevelopment #strategicdecisions #empowerment #leadershipchallenges #choicematters #criticalthinking #goalsetting #careerbuilding #selfgrowth #linkedinconnect #quoteoftheday

Culture eats strategy for breakfast, right? Most managers and business owners know if the values, behaviours, expectations, and rewards within your organization aren't aligned with what you're trying to do, even the best-conceived strategy won't succeed. This article from Strategy magazine outlines the complex relationship between culture and strategy, considers the commonalities and distinctions between them, and provides a strategic approach to building a company culture that supports the goals and values of the organization. Only when culture and strategy work together will your team achieve maximum value for those both inside and outside your company. #strategy #culture #leadership

Are you feeling stuck? Not quite sure which way to go, where you belong, let alone who you are? You are in good company. I used to get it "right". I had it under control. I followed the rules, checked the boxes, and kept it moving. Juggling, multi-tasking, makin' it look pretty. I used to handle it all perfectly. At least that’s the story I told myself! I wonder -- what happened? Where did that person go? ***** Who are you? When all is said and done, who will you become? If you are curious to play with choices and explore who you are, I invite you to join me for a 90-minute 1:1 I Am… Conversation with Changemakers. This is my gift to Changemakers; at no charge and no ongoing commitment, beyond being fully present for yourself. My invitation to you – Stand in your power. Take space. Make the choice to Be, unapologetically, completely, and fully yourself. Big & small, expanded & contracted, bold & subtle. You get to choose – none or one or both or all! This program is for Changemakers. Those who are committed to creating the conditions for change and impact in the world around them. Those who are at a moment of transition and are seeking a more aligned and integrated way to live and be. Those who are curious to explore a deeper awareness of themselves and their journeys. Those who understand the work of transformation is as deeply challenging as it is rewarding. Ready to learn more? https://lnkd.in/eRVs32Ms

I’ve been in a huge learning season lately! I’m being more intentional in figuring out the relationship between my work and policy/ advocacy. I’m taking notes on my leadership style/ skills and how that impacts the folx that I support. I’m curious about how I can leverage different tools and resources to grow professionally. I’m making more direct connections between how I live personally and how I show up at work. Overall, I’m maturing in my decision-making, finding a balance between many factors that influence choices and the impact of those choices. This type of growth isn’t easy, however the first step is recognizing the need, then doing SOMETHING about it. I love it here!

✨📖✨ Once upon a time in Silicon Valley, a young intern named Mia walked into the sprawling campus of a tech giant. On her first day, she was not greeted with a list of tasks but with a question: "What do you need to thrive here?" This wasn't just any question; it was a reflection of a #leadership style deeply rooted in understanding human needs, a style inspired by Maslow's Hierarchy. As Mia journeyed through her #career, she realized that this wasn't just the #ethos of her company but of many #corporate giants around the world. Dive with us into this narrative, as we explore how Maslow's timeless pyramid has been the unsung blueprint for leadership in the modern corporate realm. ✨🌍✨ #LeadershipBlueprint #MaslowInBusiness #CorporateNarratives #EmpatheticLeadership #ModernWorkplace #HumanFirst #ThriveInBusiness #SiliconValleyStories #LeadershipEvolution #BeyondThePyramid #AdaptiveLeadership #FutureReady #CorporateGiants #TechLeadership #MaslowReimagined #EmployeeFirst #WorkplaceWellness #LeadershipJourney #GlobalLeaders #InnovativeLeadership #PurposeDriven #MaslowPyramid https://lnkd.in/gjuv2QDY
